rules_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Put a tide counter on Tidelock Pearl.
{1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Tidelock Pearl: Search your library for a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent card with mana value less than or equal to the number of tide counters on Tidelock Pearl, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
